data.comment: The match has started.
Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the away team a throw-in.
Tigres's Javier Aquino breaks free at Estadio Universitario (UANL). But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Tigres attack but Luis Rodriguez's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 6, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Pachuca a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nuevo Leon.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, Tigres have a goal kick.
Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Tigres.
In the minute 9, At Estadio Universitario (UANL), Luis Chavez has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Tigres are coming forward and Hugo Ayala gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Pachuca a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Tigres's Eduardo Vargas attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nuevo Leon.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
Free kick Tigres.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, Kevin Alvarez (Pachuca) has received a yellow card from Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Tigres.
In the minute 19, Cesar Arturo Ramos blows against Pachuca's Kazim for offside.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Pachuca are pushing forward but Erick Aguirre's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 20, Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Tigres surge into the attack at Estadio Universitario (UANL) but Andre Pierre Gignacâ€™s header is off-target.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Throw-in Tigres.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 26, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Tigres needs to be cautious. Pachuca have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
In the minute 28, Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Jesus Duenas for Tigres gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nuevo Leon.
In the minute 31, Tigres awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Pachuca capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Pachuca push forward at Estadio Universitario (UANL) and Felipe Pardo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Tigres defence.
In the minute 32, Tigres awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pachuca to take a throw-in in Tigres territory.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 36, Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac is whistled for offside at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Felipe Pardo of Pachuca gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 37, Tigres have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tigres in the half of Pachuca.
Tigres's Guido Pizarro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 39, Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
Luis Quinones (Tigres) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 41, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a throw-in for Tigres, close to Pachuca's area.
Tigres drives forward and Luis Quinones gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Pachuca a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Tigres throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Tigres are whistled for offside.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
In the minute 45, Pachuca pushes forward through Antonio Figueroa, whose finish on goal is saved.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
At Estadio Universitario (UANL) the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Antonio Figueroa for Pachuca gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Tigres have a goal kick.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
The away team replace Kevin Alvarez with Rodrigo Salinas.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Tigres.
Erick Sanchez is replacing Luis Chavez for the away team.
Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 49, Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Pachuca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nuevo Leon.
In the minute 53, Goal! Jesus Duenas gives Tigres a 1-0 lead in Nuevo Leon.
Great play from Javier Aquino to set up the goal.
Andre Pierre Gignac for Tigres drives towards goal at Estadio Universitario (UANL). But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 56, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Pachuca.
Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
In the minute 58, The away team have replaced Antonio Figueroa with Victor Sosa. This is the third substitution made today by Paulo Pezzolano.
Luis Rodriguez for Tigres has been booked by Cesar Arturo Ramos and receives a first yellow card.
Pachuca are caught offside.
In the minute 63, Tigres awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick in a good position for Pachuca!
In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 66, Pachuca make their fourth substitution with Victor Davila replacing Kazim.
Victor Sosa gets his shot on target but fails to score for Pachuca.
In the minute 69, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Pachuca a goal kick.
Free kick Pachuca.
Tigres's Jesus Duenas gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Universitario (UANL). But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Tigres.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Pachuca close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 75, Pachuca's Efrain Orona has been booked in Nuevo Leon.
Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 77, Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Pachuca are pushing forward but Felipe Pardo's finish is wide of the goal.
Tigres have a goal kick.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Tigres.
In the minute 78, Jesus Duenas (Tigres) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Pachuca's Victor Sosa breaks free at Estadio Universitario (UANL). But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 80, Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
Pachuca are in shooting range from this free kick.
Roberto de la Rosa is replacing Efrain Orona for Pachuca at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
In the minute 82, Carlos Salcedo is on a sub for Jesus Duenas for Tigres.
Jorge Torres is replacing Luis Rodriguez for the home team.
In Nuevo Leon, Guido Pizarro (Tigres) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 84, Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
In Nuevo Leon Pachuca drive forward through Roberto de la Rosa. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Nuevo Leon Pachuca drive forward through Roberto de la Rosa. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 85, Goal! Pachuca go level at 1-1 through Victor Sosa in Nuevo Leon.
Tigres are coming forward and Guido Pizarro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Pachuca a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Tigres.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Pachuca throw-in in Tigres's half.
Throw-in for Pachuca close to the penalty box.
In the minute 89, Pachuca's Felipe Pardo misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nuevo Leon.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Throw-in Pachuca.
Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
At Estadio Universitario (UANL), Emmanuel Garcia has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Luis Quinones (Tigres) has received a first yellow card.
